name: Blackout (itch) (OfeX)
description:
F*&# ! F*&#  this F*&#ing storm! The F*&#ing electricity is out! AGAIN!<br/> I need to find the KEY to the F*&#ing PULSE CLOSET so I can fix the ELEVATOR.<br/> And go F*&#ing home!<br/><br/>Point and click to move. <br/>Endless random generated levels.<br/>

A game by:

Erez Hecht - Programming, Game design
Gali Sharaf - Art, Game design
Ofek Mizrahi - Programming, Game design
Tal Shaveh - Art,   Game design

Made in a Bezalel's unity Game Jam Course 2019.
